name: Potat 'n Friends
description:
Potat 'n Friends

A puzzle game.

Plant all crops in a random-generated, 6 by 6, isometric garden. Each plant brings some unique traits, where it would like to be planted.

How to play

Basically, use the mouse cursor and the LMB (left mouse button) to interact with the game.

First, select a plant by clicking on it. Then, click on a empty tile in the garden to place it.

Mechanics

Placing crops in the garden is rewarded with point. The following mechanics influence how many points a plant is providing.

In general, try to get all bonuses of each plant and do not violate any penalties.

Developer note

This game is a result of the Spring 2D Jam 2022. The game was created from scratch in 48h and should relate to the season of spring in general.

The jams theme was: Gardens.

Known problems and bugs
  • Browser version of the game does not show the custom 'shovel' sprite of the mouse cursor
  • Level's/seed's statistics are not calculated correctly
